system.description: The character has become a master of precise strikes, able to target specific weak points without difficulty.
system.benefit: When taking this talent Character selects either Ranged or Melee to represent "X" (affects requirements appropriately). When making a Called Shot, character does not suffer the usual -20 penalty. If X is Melee, this applies to melee attacks, if X is ranged, it applies to ranged attacks.
system.notes: Choose Ranged or Melee when taking this talent

specialAbilities.name: No Called Shot Penalty
specialAbilities.description: When making a Called Shot with the chosen attack type (Ranged or Melee), do not suffer the usual -20 penalty.
